message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, I am not able to meet the price of $15000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12000. I hope this is within your range of expectations.
